tool_description: An API showing you all the latest news about the popular TV-show Squid Game.
name: Squidify - Squid Game News
title: Squidify - Squid Game News

api_list.name: Squidify
api_list.description: This endpoint returns the name (a-tag), URL (href) and title of various articles about Squid Game.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://squidify-squid-game-news.p.rapidapi.com/squidify"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "squidify-squid-game-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://squidify-squid-game-news.p.rapidapi.com/squidify"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "squidify-squid-game-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
